title: Part One: Savitri Devi: The Woman Who Turned Nazism into a Religion
itunes:title: Part One: Savitri Devi: The Woman Who Turned Nazism into a Religion
description:
Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus to discuss Hitler's Priestess, Savitri Devi.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Hitler's Priestess
  2. Twitter Photo
  3. Savitri Devi: The strange story of how a Hindu Hitler worshipper became an alt-right icon

  5. The Man Who Brought the Swastika to Germany, and How the Nazis Stole It
  6. Ritualistic Cat Torture Was Once a Form of Town Fun
  7. The Great Cat Massacre: French History Revealed by the Americans
  8. Savitri Devi: The mystical fascist being resurrected by the alt-right
  9. Hitler is Homeless in Vienna
  10. THE PSYCHOLOGY OF THE CULT EXPERIENCE
  11.  HINDUISM AND NATIONAL SOCIALISM
  12. Priestess of Hitlerism: Savitri Devi
  13. The Death of Adolf Hitler
  14. Savitri Devi Wiki
  15. Savitri Devi
